alert.note: Alert for Edgecombe; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 6:59PM EDT until July 06 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Edgecombe County in central North Carolina... Southeastern Wilson County in central North Carolina... * Until 745 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northwest of Farmville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Macclesfield and Saratoga. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows.
